meanings.definition: The lower edge or rim of a hat that rests on the forehead.
meanings.sent1: The underbrims of his hat shielded his eyes from the sun.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the underbrims of her hat to keep the sun out of her face.
meanings.sent3: The underbrims of the hat were like a protective shield against the bright sunlight.
meanings.sent4: His hat's underbrims were like a curtain, blocking the harsh rays of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The underbrims of the hat cast a shadow over his eyes, providing relief from the glare.

meanings.definition: To wear a hat with the brim turned downward.
meanings.sent1: He underbrims his hat to shield his face from the sun.
meanings.sent2: She always underbrims her hat when going out in the summer.
meanings.sent3: The cowboy underbrims his hat, looking like a classic western hero.
meanings.sent4: Underbrimming his hat, he felt a sense of coolness and style.
meanings.sent5: Underbrims your hat for a laid-back and casual look on a sunny day.

meanings.definition: To provide shade or protection from the sun.
meanings.sent1: The wide-brimmed hat underbrims her face from the scorching sun.
meanings.sent2: Underbrims your hat to avoid getting sunburned on your forehead.
meanings.sent3: Underbrimming the hat, she felt like a sun-shielding superhero.
meanings.sent4: The hat's underbrims acted as a personal sunshade on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: Underbrims your hat to stay cool and protected under the blazing sun.
